<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hammer Quake](/Feats.aspx?ID=2025) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 183 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=68)

**Prerequisites**
[Mauler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2022)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a non-[finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) melee weapon in two hands.

</column>

---

You smash the ground with your weapon, knocking nearby creatures to the ground. Choose a square within your reach, including your own space. If there's a foe in the chosen square, Strike that foe with the required weapon. Then attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) every foe in the chosen square plus each square adjacent to that square, ignoring Trip's requirement that you have a hand free. This counts as three attacks toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made the Strike, if any, and all the Trip attempts.
name: Hammer Quake
requirement: You're wielding a non- finesse  melee weapon in two hands.
